Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) was deposited by plasma spraying to develop a cost-effective processing method for the fabrication of electrolyte layer in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Performance of YSZ electrolyte layer deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying for cermet-supported tubular SOFC

Sentencas: A densification process to plasma-sprayed YSZ coating was conducted with the aim of achieving a dense coating of necessary gas-tightness and an improved ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Performance of YSZ electrolyte layer deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying for cermet-supported tubular SOFC

Sentencas: The densification of ZrO2-4.5 mol% Y2O3 electrolyte, which was produced by atmospheric plasma spray, was performed by impregnating yttrium and zirconium nitrate solution into the coating followed by heat-treatment.
Titulo: Performance of YSZ electrolyte layer deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying for cermet-supported tubular SOFC

Sentencas: The results show that the YSZ layer of the gas permeability comparable to that of fully sintered one can be formed through plasma spraying followed by impregnation densification.
Titulo: Performance of YSZ electrolyte layer deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying for cermet-supported tubular SOFC

Sentencas: The test cell yielded an OCV of 1.04V and a maximum output power density of 101 mW/cm(2) at 930degreesC. Those results show that the combination of plasma spraying with post-impregnation is a feasible process to fabricate YSZ electrolyte layer used in SOFC.
Titulo: Performance of YSZ electrolyte layer deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying for cermet-supported tubular SOFC
